zh.title: 贝鲁特美军军营爆炸，造成重大伤亡
匈牙利宣布放弃社会主义制度
明仁天皇访问中国，促进中日关系
以色列和巴勒斯坦达成怀伊河协议
苹果公司发布iPod，革新音乐产业
莫斯科剧院人质危机爆发
罗马签署欧盟宪法条约
利比亚“全国过渡委员会”宣布全国解放
飓风帕特里夏袭击墨西哥，强度极高
沙特记者卡舒吉在土耳其遇害

en.title: Venus 9, Soviet probe, landed on Venus, transmitting first surface images.
Beirut barracks bombing killed 241 U.S. Marines and 58 French paratroopers.
Hungary declared itself a republic, ending communist rule.
Akihito became the first Emperor of Japan to visit China.
Israeli-Palestinian Wye River Memorandum signed, advancing peace process.
Moscow theater hostage crisis began, Chechen militants seized hostages.
Argentina's Cristina Fernández de Kirchner re-elected as President.
Hurricane Patricia, one of the strongest hurricanes on record, made landfall in Mexico.
Saudi Arabia admitted Jamal Khashoggi died in its Istanbul consulate.
